overview: For the first time ever, all nine mini-movies from the blockbuster animated comedies Despicable Me, Despicable Me 2, and Minions are available in one collection. Experience the hilarious hijinks when the Minions babysit their caveman boss's trouble-making toddler in Cro Minion, tune up Agnes's bicycle with high-tech upgrades in Training Wheels, and bring home a new "dog" in Puppy. This set includes six more uproarious mini-movies the whole family will love.
title: Illumination 9 Mini-Movie Collection
